description:
Reel Fishing® 3D Paradise Mini offers
a fun and challenging experience for
novice fishers and master anglers
alike. Put your skills to the test as
you must complete over 20 missions
in a variety of different fishing locals.
Each fish looks and moves so much
like the real thing, it's the closest you
can get to real-life fishing without
putting on your waders! Choose from
a variety of lures to attract and hook
the game's numerous wily fish. Do
you have what it takes to become the
next great Fishing Master!
name:
Reel Fishing® 3D
Paradise Mini
